attributes.action: Cancel vocational btec level 3 exams for May 2021!
attributes.additional_details: Its unfair for a levels exam to be cancelled and not btec vocational exam in May 2021 as theyre both equivalent courses with equal exams and as they have all been equally disrupted with covid and lockdown and many people have missed the majority of exam content due to this so it would be unfair for them to have to sit the exams. Btec exams should be easier to cancel as they have coursework and clear evidence of their grade to be graded on unlike a levels and it won’t be safe to sit exams in May
attributes.background: It is unfair for a levels exams to be cancelled and not btecs level 3 exams as they have all been equally disrupted with covid and lockdown and many people have missed a lot of exam content due to this so it would be unfair for them to have to sit the exams so we want the government to cancel them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778
